_header: Whoso seeth on rood Jesu is lief man
_description: A meditation on the Passion, trals. Latin ‘Respice in faciem christi tui…’ — seven long lines, some with medial rhyme

CamTCC323.First Lines:
Wose seþe on rode ihesus is lef monsori stod him bi wepinde
                    sent marie & sent Ion…
CamTCC323.Last Lines:
…al for sunne of mon Sore he may wepin& bittre teris letin
                    mon þad of luue con
CamTCC323.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             English Lyrics of the XIIIth Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1932: 61-2.
Stevick,  Robert D.,
                        ed.  
             One Hundred Middle English Lyrics.
         Indianapolis: Bobbs-Merrill, 1964: 21.
